posts.post_content:
I have picked up 6 catcher colored silks over the past few months and would like  to purchase more. Looking for Ex condition examples without needle marks. Will pay strong for nice examples.

Please let me know if you have any of the following colored silks available:
 
Bill Bergen
Charles Dooin
George Gibson
Peaches Graham
Johnny Kling
Chief Meyers
Pat Moran
George Schlei
Gabby Street

Thanks,


Patrick

Hi Rick,

I sent a response to your email yesterday regarding the medium blue Kling S74.

In the event that my email went to your spam file, please sent me a scan and your asking price.

Thanks,

Patrick
